title: Teach yourself to play the piano with AI-powered Skoove Premium, now just $149
content:
Macworld

People who play musical instruments often enjoy reduced stress, increased confidence, and added social opportunities. Want to take advantage of these benefits but don’t have time for music lessons? Then try learning to play the piano on your own with a lifetime subscription to Skoove Premium.

With over one million users, Skoove Premium is one of the most popular and celebrated platforms out there for learning how to play the piano. It introduces the basics, shows you how to play chords, and it listens to your progress so you’ll always improve. And once you get the hang of it, it’ll teach you how to play actual songs from some of the world’s top musicians so you’ll be able to impress an audience.

Skoove Premium gives subscribers access to over 400 lessons, one-on-one support from real instructors, and the opportunity to take special courses. It’s compatible with a wide range of devices so chances are good it’ll work with what you currently have (though if you need a computer this MacBook Air is popular).

If you ever wanted to learn how to tickle the ivories, then this is a great opportunity. Particularly this week since a lifetime subscription to Skoove Premium is only $149.99, which is the lowest price anywhere on the web.

 

Skoove Premium Piano Lessons: Lifetime Subscription – $149.99
